channel.title: The only thing bad about RSC

item.title: The only thing bad about RSC
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

This whole thread is bullshit, just because RSC private servers are more stable doesn’t mean anyone is going to play them more, the 12 year old kids just want to make characters they never had on RS2.

item.title: The only thing bad about RSC
item.dc:creator: @T3arful T3arful
item.description:
@T3arful wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:29, topic:348844”]i have seen how the rs2 pservers are around here, and ill list a few reasons why i’d never play them.

  1. stability (they can’t hold a good amount of players and/or they crash often and/or shutdown when jagex send a letter)
  2. economy (at least, the servers i played were instant max level, or high rates, or fish from a fucking fountain to gain rune armor, or admins selling admin/mod positions, or items for donations)
  3. lack of content (i’d like to play a server with more than, logging into a PK room with full dragon and watching lv 999’s ice barrage everyone, and/or no skills working, glitches in half of the content added, or a half ass job at adding content)

oh, and that RS2 is shit, but that’s my personal opinion ofc.[/quote]

So your entire argument is based on what RS2 servers were like 3 years ago?

Read full topic
item.source: The only thing bad about RSC

item.title: The only thing bad about RSC
item.description:
@5_1 wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:26, topic:348844”][quote author=Kihomura link=topic=445218.msg3269116#msg3269116 date=1279074336]
I like the comments saying that RSC is shit, but not elaborating why. There is nothing wrong with RSC. In fact, it’s much better than the current RuneScape, in many ways.

-Not as childish as RuneScape (guards around fucking barbarian village telling you its dangerous)
-Not as hands on (not telling you where to start quests, etc)
-Trading, my God, trading.
-Player killing.
[/quote]

You don’t really need to explain why it is shit. It just is. Hence the reason I call it shit.

You know, you don’t ask people why they don’t like excrement, just that it is shit (literally, in this case). Same sort of thing.[/quote]
woah tupac, calm down… Don’t shoot anyone

Read full topic
item.source: The only thing bad about RSC

item.title: The only thing bad about RSC
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:47, topic:348844”]Since when can you not eat during a fight in real life? Since when do you just sit there, moving your sword like a stick figure attacking? Also, can’t you run away from a fight as soon as it starts? Ya, because you can eat during a fight in RS2 makes RSC make a lot more sense.[/quote]This. beats. all.

Read full topic
item.source: The only thing bad about RSC

item.title: The only thing bad about RSC
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:38, topic:348844”][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=445218.msg3269391#msg3269391 date=1279086878]

The truth: the current RSC private servers are more stable then the current RS2 private servers.
[/quote]More stable, but for reasons said by others not as widely used or appreciated.

My post was to argue the fact you can’t compare a RSC private server and a RS2 private server based on stability and performance (considering RSC wins hands down). The game play on a RS2/RSC private server is a different matter.

Anyways, they both have great game play, but RSC is far more restricted then RS2, which is why RS2 is better (imo).

What are you talking about stability on RS2? just because half the servers released still use the shitty old Winterlove base doesn’t mean we don’t have any bases that are extremely stable, a list would be RS2DV, Hyperion, RS377, Helios, etc. You can’t compare them no matter what because they have their good parts and the bad parts. You guys just look at RS2 from the winterlove stand point and don’t add in all of the amazing scartch servers released.[/quote]

Yes, but the stereotypical rs2 private server uses a winterlove server as its base. Your argument is valid though, but you also have to take into account that RSC is much more simple game compared to RS2.

As I said before, I prefer RS2 over RSC, the game play is simply better.

Read full topic
item.source: The only thing bad about RSC

Also, can’t you run away from a fight as soon as it starts? Ya, because you can eat during a fight in RS2 makes RSC make a lot more sense.[/quote] Hahahaha. You win this round.

item.title: The only thing bad about RSC
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Errorist, post:45, topic:348844”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=445218.msg3269411#msg3269411 date=1279087992]

[quote author=Errorist link=topic=445218.msg3269409#msg3269409 date=1279087941]

[quote author=Lin link=topic=445218.msg3269403#msg3269403 date=1279087593]

I’ve played on RSC servers with 200+ online.

I’ve never joined an RS2 server with a stable connection.

RSC servers have original ideas. example: DarkQuest

RS2 servers have stupid names to go with stupid items. example: the wonderful DavidScape

RSC > RS2
[/quote]Let me stop you right there. Your argument is terrible. You say RuneScape Classic is better than RuneScape 2, but here you’re going off about RSPS? In terms of graphics, sounds, (lack of) music, engine and flexibility, RuneScape 2 tops RuneScape Classic in many, many ways. Just because Classic servers just happen to be made better and the users are more creative and don’t make them for money doesn’t mean at all it’s better than RuneScape 2.
[/quote]Official RuneScape Classic is better than RuneScape 2. RuneScape Classic Private Servers are better than RuneScape 2 Private Servers.
Do you really think the music and dancing is something to brag about?

See you have nothing to add all you can say is RSC is better yet you can’t back it up with any real facts.
[/quote]Okay, can you seriously eat in combat in RS2? If that rumor is true then you shouldn’t be arguing for RuneScape 2.[/quote]

I see no problem with eating in combat, is there a problem with it?

Read full topic
item.source: The only thing bad about RSC

Just because Classic servers just happen to be made better and the users are more creative and don’t make them for money doesn’t mean at all it’s better than RuneScape 2.

Do you really think the music and dancing is something to brag about?

See you have nothing to add all you can say is RSC is better yet you can’t back it up with any real facts.[/quote]Okay, can you seriously eat in combat in RS2? If that rumor is true then you shouldn’t be arguing for RuneScape 2.

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Errorist, post:39, topic:348844”]I’ve played on RSC servers with 200+ online.

I’ve never joined an RS2 server with a stable connection.

RSC servers have original ideas. example: DarkQuest

RS2 servers have stupid names to go with stupid items. example: the wonderful DavidScape

RSC > RS2 [/quote]
I’ve played 317’s with 400+ online

  • a stable connection

So do we, just not as many.

So do many RSC servers.

Rs2 > RSC

item.title: The only thing bad about RSC
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Errorist, post:39, topic:348844”]I’ve played on RSC servers with 200+ online.

I’ve never joined an RS2 server with a stable connection.

RSC servers have original ideas. example: DarkQuest

RS2 servers have stupid names to go with stupid items. example: the wonderful DavidScape

RSC > RS2 [/quote]

You are still looking at it by the Winterlove stand point, most servers on the server status list are shit and are leeches. Also when I look in the advertising section of the RSC section I see what 331 topics? what the fuck do you call that you guys have near to no RSC servers to choose from, then i see what 3 top ones that are the only ones with atleast 200+ post that aren’t locked. Once again the only reason there isn’t any good ideas is because most people who add a server to the list don’t even know Java, again most RS2 servers have dumb names because the people who own then just joined and don’t know shit about servers.

Stop saying one is better then the other, because neither is better. They both have things that are better, suck, or are the same. Ive never played a RSC server, but now that I see how they hate everyone that doesn’t play RSC I am highly doubting I will play it now.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:37, topic:348844”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=445218.msg3269377#msg3269377 date=1279085307]

The truth: the current RSC private servers are more stable then the current RS2 private servers.
[/quote]More stable, but for reasons said by others not as widely used or appreciated.

My post was to argue the fact you can’t compare a RSC private server and a RS2 private server based on stability and performance (considering RSC wins hands down). The game play on a RS2/RSC private server is a different matter.

Anyways, they both have great game play, but RSC is far more restricted then RS2, which is why RS2 is better (imo).[/quote]

What are you talking about stability on RS2? just because half the servers released still use the shitty old Winterlove base doesn’t mean we don’t have any bases that are extremely stable, a list would be RS2DV, Hyperion, RS377, Helios, etc. You can’t compare them no matter what because they have their good parts and the bad parts. You guys just look at RS2 from the winterlove stand point and don’t add in all of the amazing scartch servers released.

item.title: The only thing bad about RSC

[quote=“Davidi2, post:36, topic:348844”][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=445218.msg3269242#msg3269242 date=1279079589]
The truth: the current RSC private servers are more stable then the current RS2 private servers.
[/quote]More stable, but for reasons said by others not as widely used or appreciated.[/quote]
My post was to argue the fact you can’t compare a RSC private server and a RS2 private server based on stability and performance (considering RSC wins hands down). The game play on a RS2/RSC private server is a different matter.

Anyways, they both have great game play, but RSC is far more restricted then RS2, which is why RS2 is better (imo).
